message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,500 to make this deal work.  Let's meet in the middle - what do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $13,500, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $13,000. Let's see if we can make a deal.
